headline: Assessing American Water Works (AWK) After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: If you are wondering whether American Water Works Company is offering fair value at its recent price, this article walks through what the numbers are saying and how that might matter for your portfolio. The stock recently closed at US$133.34, with returns of 4.2% over the last 7 days, 2.3% year to date, and 7.9% over the past year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns stand at a 6.0% decline and an 8.6% decline respectively. Recent share price moves have been drawing more attention to how...
